newsitem.title: INDIA: Hitachi sets up subsidiary in India.
newsitem.headline: Hitachi sets up subsidiary in India.

text.p: Hitachi Asia Private Ltd, an affiliate of Japan's Hitachi Ltd, said on Tuesday it had set up a wholly-owned subsidiary in India to oversee its operations in the country.

Hitachi India Pvt Ltd will coordinate and support liaison, marketing, sales, trading and investments and also play an active role in developing projects for export of computer software and hardware, the company said in a statement.
Hitachi India's managing director, Kazuyoshi Sumida, will supervise an initial staff of 25, the statement said.

"Since 1948, Hitachi has provided equipment and expertise in a wide range of industrial and infrastructure areas in India including power generation, transport, petrochemicals and steel manufacturing," Sumida said in the statement.
